Awards

Merit award to attend the BUCA’22 summer school at the Bertinoro Internation Center for Informatics.

Merit award from Opera Pia Novello foundation.

Merit-based scholarship awarded by the University of Padova to the best 500 students enrolled in STEM degrees.
